body:
Thanks for reporting!

That should mean default to the repository root, can you please send a PR to fix this issue?
https://cs.opensource.google/bazel/bazel/+/master:src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/repository/starlark/StarlarkBaseExternalContext.java;l=1563

issue.title: Clarify /rules/lib/builtins/repository_ctx description of default working_directory for execute()

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system
